quote: An adventurer has a purpose. Such as finding new lands and valuable treasures. A misadventurer, besides doing it for the hell of it and for a good time, doesn't really have a good purpose.
quote_letters: AN ADVENTURER HAS A PURPOSE SUCH AS FINDING NEW LANDS AND VALUABLE TREASURES A MISADVENTURER BESIDES DOING IT FOR THE HELL OF IT AND FOR A GOOD TIME DOESNT REALLY HAVE A GOOD PURPOSE
